name: Staff Lower Back Holster
description: Staffs are holstered across the lower back.

languages.description: Stabwaffen werden am unteren Rücken geholstert.
languages.name: Stab-Holster: Rücken, Unten

languages.description: Les Bâtons sont portés le long du bas du dos.
languages.name: Port de Bâton au bas du dos

languages.description: Rinfodera le Staffe nella parte bassa della schiena.
languages.name: Rinfodero Staffa Schiena Bassa

languages.description: 스태프 계열 무기를 등 하부에 수납하는 수납 방식입니다.
languages.name: 스태프 등 하부 홀스터

languages.description: Los bastones se enfundarán a lo largo de la espalda baja.
languages.name: Enfundado de espalda baja de bastón

languages.description: 将棍棒武器跨肩收纳在背后。
languages.name: 棍棒后背收纳姿态

languages.description: 背中の下部分にスタッフ系武器を収納。
languages.name: スタッフ専用ボトムバックホルスター

languages.description: Os bastões são guardadas na lombar.
languages.name: Bastões: Coldre Nas Costas (Inferior)

languages.description: 棍棒武器可跨過下背收納。
languages.name: 棍棒後腰收納姿態

languages.description: กระบองที่ใส่ซองพาดหลังส่วนล่าง
languages.name: ซองกระบองด้านหลังส่วนล่าง

languages.description: Посохи кріпляться на попереку, коли в руках інша зброя.
languages.name: Посох на попереку
